en-US: You may see a lot of social media accounts that either says 'Official' or associated with us. But you can't always trust somebody you've never met before, right? It's easy to create a fake account and impersonate someone else, which doesn't take much effort. We only control the official accounts listed below, and we don't have any other accounts.
zh-CN: 您可能会看到很多声称 '官方' 或与我们相关的社交媒体账户。但你不能总是相信你从未见过的人，对吧？创建假帐户并冒充其他人很容易，这并不需要太多努力。我们只控制下面列出的官方帐户，并且没有其他帐户。
